title: Service Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at North Bay Regional Center
Interview Descriptions: Interview was done with 3 supervisors. Once the interview was conducted, a scenario based test was given, where it asked what you would do in time sensitive emergency instances. Also asked specific questions regarding what services you would recommend doing for an example client with a disability.
Interview Questions: Describe your most current work experience and how it would help in this position.

title: Service Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 6 days. I interviewed at North Bay Regional Center in May 2016
Interview Descriptions: Phone interview from the HR, group panel interview lasted for 1 hour,  basic questions per experience, mostly case management experience and organizational skills.  written exam (mostly scenarios). Interviewers are friendly, not too uptight.
Interview Questions: why do you want to work at the regional center?
